attributes.action: try anyone over the age of 12 as an adult in cases of assault
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With "children" today being able to hide behind the law they seem to feel that they are immune from serious punishment. Today a "goth" from Bacup Lancashire has died after being in a coma following several "youths" assaulting her and her partner. The youths were all aged under 18 and while the trials have not happened a lenient punishment is bound to be handed down instead of murder. This needs to change so that children understand that they ARE responsible for their own actions.
